briefTitle: Pain Control in Breast Surgery: Analgesia, Opioid Consumption and Inflammatory Response Evaluation
officialTitle: Pain Control in Breast Surgery: Analgesia, Opioid Consumption and Inflammatory Response Evaluation
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* American Society Anesthesiology (ASA) Scale I and II patients
* Patients submitted to breast cancer
* informed consent signature

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with chronic pain
* Local anesthesia reaction/allergy
